title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 19.3 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 19.3 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements

State Regulations

Each banking institution establishing an IBF shall, in
connection with its IBF, maintain such books and records in such form as the

Superintendent of Banks shall prescribe; and shall submit such reports
concerning the operations of its IBF as the Superintendent of Banks shall
prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
19.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
